2021 WARN Notices

2021 Missouri WARN Log

 

Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification Act (WARN Act) notices received from employers by the Missouri Office of Workforce Development's Dislocated Worker Program, January through December 2021.

Media inquiries concerning this information should be directed to the Missouri Department of Higher Education and Workforce Development Communications Team.

The Missouri Office of Workforce Development is a proud partner of the American Job Center network.

Missouri Department of Higher Education and Workforce Development is an equal opportunity employer/program.
Auxiliary aids and services are available upon request to individuals with disabilities. Missouri Relay 711.
